src:
PMI今年5月以來首度擴張 節慶與奧運助攻
01 Nov 2019, 12:27 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
中經院1日公布10月經季調後的製造業採購經理人指數（PMI），續揚1.1個百分點達到51.1%，是2019年5月以來首次呈現擴張。新增訂單指數達52.7%，擴張速度是2018年10月以來最快。中央社製圖 108年11月1日
text:
PMI's first expansion since May this year, festival and Olympic assists
01 Nov 2019, 12:27 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
On the 1st, the Chinese Academy of Economics announced the seasonally adjusted manufacturing purchasing managers' index (PMI) in October, which rose by 1.1 percentage points to 51.1%, the first expansion since May 2019. The new order index reached 52.7%, and the expansion rate was the fastest since October 2018. Central Society Charting November 1, 108
